Shiny Integration

tabulatorOutput() renderTabulator()
Shiny bindings for rtabulator
tabulatorContext()
Create a Tabulator Context Object A tabulatorContext object makes it possible to update your widget in a Shiny app.
add_row()
Add a row to the table
delete_selected_rows()
Delete selected rows from the table
trigger_download()
Download table data
trigger_get_data()
Submit data to R
trigger_get_spreadsheet_data()
Submit data to R
undo()
Undo changes
redo()
Redo changes
